name: ProtoCorgi - Old Parry Prototype
description:
Hello!

This is a very outdated prototype stripped down to the basics required for Absorb and Stop Time mechanic.

If you enjoyed the prototype don't forget to follow the Devlog for more information and updates about our projects:

http://www.kemonogames.com

Changelog:

v0.041:

  • Changed player hitbox size to a smaller one.
  • Added a Visual cue for hitbox.

v0.04:

  • Now the player can parry dead and revive after a bullet hit, only if parry is available and isn't using stop time.
  • More visual feedback on stop time bar when Stop Time isn't available.
  • Added debug mode flag to options
